entry.summary: RT buildspace 🚨 FINAL CALL - 4 hours 20 minutes left to get your applications in for Nights & Weekends! 🚨 see u soon ✨ buildspace: Introducing — Nights and Weekends 🌙 A new way for you to build shit you're passionate about alongside incredible builders. entry.summary: RT ropats16 | (🧱, 🚀) ᵍᵐ LFG!! 🚀🔥 We ended up deploying to @ArweaveTeam’s permaweb 2 diff ways. I used @TexturyOrg’s arkb CLI . Learning and debugging with @pbillingsby_eth has been super fun!! Y’all in for a treat with 2 articles about deploying to permaweb on the way Also more alpha soon 👀 pbillingsby.eth: Just deployed a @nextjs app to @ArweaveTeam permaweb using @SpheronHQ. For what it is, it was relatively simple. I plan on writing about the experience soon, but couldn't contain my excitement when it finally worked. @ropats16 we're in business 👀 https://k4om6tezg6wwssxxugf26kasrs2kccwjlnjvsubqddwibnq.arweave.net/Vx-z-P_TJk3rW-lK96GLrygSjLShCslbU1lQMBjsgLY
